dike noun [C]
(ROCK LAYER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
earth science a layer of newer rock that is created when melted rock flows into spaces in older rock and then hardens
dike noun [C]
(WALL)
a long wall that prevents water, esp. from the sea, from flooding a place
